People are complaining that this download is a RAR file with a password, let me explain what is going on. Peer Media Technologies, a faggot anti piracy company is spoofing on this torrents. That means they are seeding fucked up version of the file on this torrent. I think the best way to stop this is to make sure your hash check is on. Please add the range 173.201.0.0-173.201.255.255 to your IP filter. It's PM's website range, although I cannot confirm that it is the IPs they are using to deface this torrent.
